reference: Online complements to Stock and Watson (2007).
description:
Description
Panel data on cigarette consumption for the 48 continental US States from 1985–1995.
title: Cigarette Consumption Panel Data

parameters.price: Average price during fiscal year, including sales tax.
parameters.tax: Average state, federal and average local excise taxes for fiscal year.
parameters.taxs: Average excise taxes for fiscal year, including sales tax.

format: A data frame containing 48 observations on 7 variables for 2 periods.
